title: Concrete pays
creator_credit: British Information Services and Drayton Film Productions
brief_description: The use of concrete can help farmers achieve greater efficiency, safety and hygiene. Deals with its use on farms for roads, yards and block-walling, insulated floors and the correct methods to be used in such work by inexperienced farm labour. Uses of cement based paints are also shown.
